titleStmt.title: An ansvveare vnto certaine crabbed questions pretending a reall presence of Christ in the Sacramente: latelie propounded by some secret papist, to the great troubling of the consciences of the simple, together with a discouerie of the Jesuiticall opinion of justification, guilefully vttered by Sherwyne at the time of his execution. Gathered and set foorth by Peter Whyte, very necessary & profitable for this dangerous time.
titleStmt.author: White, Peter, Vicar of Eaton Socon.

titleStmt.title: An ansvveare vnto certaine crabbed questions pretending a reall presence of Christ in the Sacramente: latelie propounded by some secret papist, to the great troubling of the consciences of the simple, together with a discouerie of the Jesuiticall opinion of justification, guilefully vttered by Sherwyne at the time of his execution. Gathered and set foorth by Peter Whyte, very necessary & profitable for this dangerous time.
titleStmt.author: White, Peter, Vicar of Eaton Socon.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Wolfe and Henry Kirkham, & are to be sold at his shop at the little north doore of S. Paule,

notesStmt.note: In two parts, each with separate register and pagination; part 2 has separate dated title page, reading: A discoverie of the Iesuiticall opinion of justification, guilefullie uttered by Sherwine at the time of his execution: gathered and set foorth by Peter White .. .
Many errors in pagination; text continuous.
Part 2 cropped at edges, slightly affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

person.persName: White, Peter, Vicar of Eaton Socon.
